attributes.action: Ban the sale & importation of Lego Fun Snacks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lego Fun Snacks are fruit filled little blocks that look just like the building block toys we are all familiar with. Adults here spend a lot of time trying to teach young children not to stick toys and other objects into their mouths. The potential for confusion is very real with young children and could cause a child's death.
